item.name: 7 Cudów Świata
item.comment:
Fantastic game! I want to play it all the time. Maybe after a number of plays I'll get bored, but for now I see interesting decision in every turn, many combinations, many different possibilities, and different strategies.
And everything in 20-30 minutes!
Just brilliant!

item.name: Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
Discoveries
item.comment:
Below my expectations. Works ok, but too much luck, and there isn't much going on.
But the art is beautiful, as always with Vincent Dutrait.

item.name: Drako
item.comment: Light, fast 2-player game with good theme and fantastic production (miniatures especially).

item.name: Earth Reborn
item.comment:
Nice mechanics lots of decisions in turn.
The icons on cards, bits and board are horrible.
Preparing time is so long I don't want to play the game no more.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
Gears of War: The Board Game
In the Year of the Dragon
K2
item.comment:
Grate racing game where you struggle to survive, go up, and then run down not to loose oxygen. But only on harder board, and in winter the game is that intense and stresful. when you play on easy variang it is strictly family game, and nothing more - that setting is only for begginers.
Definately a buy if You want to have nice-looking family game, and stresfull, and fresh strategy/family game in one box.

item.name: Khan
item.comment:
Some aspects of the game are ok, but nothing special there. Plus some graphics, and colors may be mistaken.
All in all - worth trying, but for most players it will end after one play.

item.name: Kingdom Builder
item.comment:
Very little decisions in the game, the only thing it has going for it is a madular game board, and different scoring cards.
Basically You take a card and have to place 3 buildings on a territory shown on a card, plus You have to place buildings near You other buildings if You can. A the end You get some points. That's it! :)

item.name: Kolejka
item.comment:
5/10 za mechanikę
10/10 za temat, wykonanie i cenę
średnia = 7.5/10 :)

item.name: Ninjato
item.comment:
One game so far, want to play more.
Very cool game, some luck, a lot of choices and decissions within 45-60 minutes of game.

item.name: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
Prêt-à-Porter
item.comment: Bardzo fajna gra, sporo kombinowania, ciekawy temat, ale: -przy więcej niż 2 graczach rośnie chaos -problemy wydawnicze -słabo zbalansowane karty

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Revolver
item.comment: Played 2 times. Might play more, but why bother.

item.name: Santiago de Cuba
item.comment: Very good game. Sometimes rounds seem to repetetive, but it all depends on how much money people spend on movement.

item.name: Showboat
item.comment:
After one play at Essen 2010. Interesting racing game, where you play cards to slow down boats.
Would be even better if I liked the theme.

item.name: Sobek
item.comment: Very nicely produced, grate quality, but not interesting gameplay.

item.name: Space Hulk: Anioł Śmierci – Gra karciana
item.originalname: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis!
item.comment:
This is something different than anything you played. It's not the best family/party game, but (especially for 3 and 4) players combination of luck, many movement possibilities, player interaction, and fantastic quality it's deinately worth buying.
I like this although I played 4 times, and won only once;)

item.name: Undermining
item.comment: Drill, get stuff, get upgrade (different types, but all are similar), drill some more, get points. That's it.
